response.overview: With electrifying power and a big love of battling, Pikachu is ready for adventure alongside Ash and their Pokémon friends! As their journey begins, they face a flock of menacing Spearow, battle the villainous Team Rocket, and challenge Lt. Surge and Raichu in a Gym battle…but will an encounter with a group of wild Pikachu change everything? Then, a surfing Pikachu makes waves, Pikachu and Meowth work together to find their friends, and our heroes help out some hungry Pichu! Finally, a tough opponent tests the limits of Pikachu’s strength—but Ash and Pikachu have just the plan to win!
response.title: Pokemon: Pikachu & Friends
